item.title: Générémós
item.description: The Générémós, or, more specifically, the Générémós Liré, is the highest legislative body in the Liran Republic. It functions similarly to a national parliament, though there are some notable differences. It consists of a 144 member legislative body, with 8 parties represented as of the 3660 parliamentary elections.

item.title: Liran Political Parties
item.description: NYM> NYM # Rétómun Nayóma Liré(lit. party central liran, “Liran Centrist Party”), or just Nayóma, represented by dark green, is a moderately progressive party in the Liran Republic. Nayóma is especially popular among the youth, and has seen a large spike in popularity because of it.

item.title: Sénórémós
item.description: The Sénórémós, or, more specifically, the Sénórémós Liré, is the highest executive body in the Liran Republic. The closest real-world equivalent would be the Swiss Federal Council, but even that differs greatly.
